front.title: Attribution Option for Extension Header Insertion

abstract.t: This document defines an "attribution option" that provides attribution for IPv6 extension headers, Hop-by-Hop options, or Destination options that are inserted by intermediate nodes in the delivery path of a packet. The purpose of this option is twofold: first it identifies the extension headers or options that have been inserted, secondly it attributes the inserted extension headers or options to the node responsible for inserting them.
